name: Broan Direct-Discharge Exhaust Fan
description: The Broan 270 CFM Direct-Discharge Exhaust Fan features a permanently lubricated motor with easy twist-lock installation and a built-in damper to minimize back drafts. The fan ventilates areas up to 240 sq. ft. and helps eliminate humidity, tobacco smoke and cooking fumes. The fan housing adjusts to fit walls from 4-1/2 in. to 9-1/2 in. thick.Motor pulls 270 CFM at 6 sones to help eliminate humidity, tobacco smoke and cooking fumesPermanently lubricated motor provides a long lifeVentilates areas up to 240 sq. ft. for use in laundry rooms, kitchens, recreation rooms and workshopsUL listedDirect dischargeHome Depot Protection Plan:
